```{r}
full_trains <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-02-26/full_trains.csv")

```

```{r}
#Visualization 1
Visualization1 =
  ggplot(full_trains, aes(x = journey_time_avg)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 500, 100)) +
  labs(x = "Journey Time (mins.)", y = "Number of instances")
Visualization1
title(main = "Histogram of Average Journey Time for trains on the SNCF Network") 


```
